rows.label: tev016002_MSG0001
rows.name: Hey! You're that new [ST:gender p1=guy p2=gal ], aren'tcha?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev016002_MSG0002
rows.name:
The new crew member that Elma found, right?
I was wondering what sorta person you'd be.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev016002_MSG0003
rows.name:
You're a handsome one, that's for sure...
Yessir! I like the cut of your jib.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev016002_MSG0004
rows.name:
You're a pretty one, that's for sure...
Yes, ma'am! I like the cut of your jib.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev016002_MSG0005
rows.name: Well, welcome to New LA. We're happy to have you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev016002_MSG0006
rows.name:
I'm sure there's all sorts of stuff you have to do before
you get situated, eh? Paperwork and whatnot?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev016002_MSG0007
rows.name:
In that case, you can just hop right into that transport
that's idling over there, and it'll take you straight to the
administrative district.[ST:wait ]
